name: PHASESpatializationMode
desc: The manner in which PHASE outputs spatial audio.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: A mode that indicates that the framework chooses the spatialization mode.

items.name: case alwaysUseBinaural
items.desc: A mode that introduces special processing to replicate a realistic spatial listening experience.

items.name: case alwaysUseChannelBased
items.desc: A mode that adds a 3D position and orientation to sound by panning across the available output channels.
